## Usage

### Html

```html
<bm-card-header>
  <p class="card-header-title">Component</p>
  <a href="#" class="card-header-icon" aria-label="more options">
    <span class="icon">
      <i class="fas fa-angle-down" aria-hidden="true"></i>
    </span>
  </a>
</bm-card-header>
```
